options.name: Action : Focused Hunt
options.description: You use your Focus to concentrate on eliminating or capturing one Creature within 20 Units. While you maintain your Focus, you gain +2 Movement Speed towards that Creature and gain a +2 Attack Bonus Modifier but have a -2 Attack Bonus Modifier against all other Creatures.

options.name: Improved Nets
options.description: When you use a Net, the Required Check for avoiding a Grapple is increased by 2 and the Structure Points are doubled.

options.name: Action : Wanted Alive
options.description: You Touch a Creature that is in Lifeline and cause them to become Unconscious and no longer lose Lifeline Points at the end of their turn. You can also make this Check against a Humanoid that has Died after the end of your last turn by making a Medicine Check of 10 or higher.

options.name: Reaction : Quick Draw
options.description: Before your turn in Initiative Order, you can take the Use Action or make a Ranged Attack with a Light or Ultra-Light Ranged Weapon.

options.name: Craft : Trophy Infusion
options.description: You can collect a trophy from a corpse and use it as an Infusion while crafting a Weapon, Shield or piece of Armor that does not increase the difficulty of the Required Check. While you have this item equipped, you gain a +2 Bonus to Block, Dodge and Resistance against Creatures that are equal to or lower Level and the same Creature Type as the trophy.
